description: Part ground floor, part first floor rear extensions, alterations and extensions to roof including extension to provide gable end second floor roof extension above existing bay, addition of 1 no. side dormer window,  no. 2 additional front facing and 2 side facing roof lights to provide 5no. self-contained flats. Retention of existing D1 use. Associated amenity space, refuse storage, bike store and off-street car parking [amended description and plans]
decision_conditions: C405 - Roof not to be used as balcony
C325 -Details of cycle parking and strge
